message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this high-end product with you. I think you'll really appreciate its unique features and benefits. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price that works better for both of us. My counteroffer for the product is $15000.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and features.
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a price closer to what I initially offered. My counteroffer is now $16000.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. I think this price reflects the product's value and is a fair offer for both of us.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $16000.

I've already offered you a price of $16500 in the previous round, and you're coming back with the same offer of $16000. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm willing to meet you at $16250, but I'm not budging further. This is my final counteroffer.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I am willing to pay $16000 for it.

I've already made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $16250, and you're still offering $16000. I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $16375. This is my last offer.
